comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Another Bain/LOC photo of James Clark McReynolds (1862-1946), U. S. Attorney General (1913-14) and U. S. Supreme Court Justice (1914-41): www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/2615539023/

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: Haldane was a bachelor according to the Wikipedia article. And the negative has "Miss Haldane" written on it. And so it seems unlikely that she should be called "Viscountess Haldane." I'd suggest this might be his sister, Elizabeth. See en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Elizabeth_Haldane. NYT of August 31, 1913 query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9D07E6DC123FE633A... confirms that she accompanied him on this visit to the United States.

comment.author: 23103743@N05
comment._content: See query.nytimes.com/gst/abstract.html?res=9F05E6DC1531E733A... for a review of Elizabeth Haldane's 1906 biography of Descartes. The tone of the review conveys as much about the times as the pictures do.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Thanks all. At the very least we can straighten out the names in the title and add a date to this record the next time we update it.   Can anyone guess who the gentleman is on the right?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: The man at the right may be Judge Dickinson. In this adjoining Bain/LOC photo, Dickinson wears a similar "skimmer" or boater, hat -- but a different coat: www.flickr.com/photos/library_of_congress/4058499994/in/p...

comment.author: 76222546@N00
comment._content: Ah..the elitists of the early 1900s :D My have times changed.

comment.author: 35234565@N04
comment._content: Wystan: I think that you are right about Judge Dickinson. Do you think that the man between James McReynolds and Elizabeth Haldane is Sir K.M. McKenzie?

comment.author: 70251312@N00
comment._content: Elizabeth Sanderson Haldane was a Cartesian scholar, with the British equivalent of a PhD. The full text of her Descartes biography may be read on Google Books (from the Harvard University Library copy!): DESCARTES -- HIS LIFE AND TIMES books.google.com/books?id=7VsRAAAAYAAJ&pg=PR5&dq=...
